sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import './checkout-item.styles.scss' import { clearItemFromCart, addItem, removeItem } from '../../redux/cart/cart-actions' const Checkout = ({ cartItem }) => { const { name, imageUrl, price, quantity } = cartItem const dispatch = useDispatch() return (
{name}
dispatch(removeItem(cartItem))}>❮
{quantity}
dispatch(addItem(cartItem))}>❯
 ${price}
dispatch(clearItemFromCart(cartItem))}>✕
) } export default Checkout
